aboutUs:info.first_text: Elandic Content creates content and ideas and brings together a team of passionate, creative and flexible talents
aboutUs:info.second_text: Elandic Content is based in Moscow, but our projects cover all corners of the world with a pragmaticand serious production logicthat meets the expectations of our customers.
aboutUs:info.third_text: Since 2015, we have been specializing increating and activating content: digital campaigns, motion design, special projects with stars, content for global brands, business communications and much more. Our clients are always successful people, very passionate about their business and life, ready to entrust us with their reputation and promotion.
aboutUs:info.forth_text: Since we know that every story, every interlocutor is unique, we work with the best specialists and the latest technical tools that allow us to cover all stages of production; from the adoption of summary reports to the delivery of content.
aboutUs:info.satisfied: If you are very satisfied, we are very satisfied!
